dcterms:creator: Xinyu Jia
Chuang Zhu
Minzhen Li
Wenqi Tang
Wenli Zhou
dcterms:description: LLVIP is an aligned visible and infrared (IR) dataset collected in low-light environments for pedestrian detection, which contains 15,488 RGB-IR image pairs. Following the official standards, we use 12,025 pairs for training and 3,463 pairs for testing.
dcterms:title: LLVIP

dcterms:creator: Jinyuan Liu
Xin Fan
Zhanbo Huang
Guanyao Wu
Risheng Liu
Wei Zhong
Zhongxuan Luo
dcterms:description: M 3F D contains 4,200 RGB and IR-aligned image pairs collected in various environments including different lighting, seasons, and weather scenarios. It has six categories usually appearing in autonomous driving and road monitoring.
dcterms:title: M 3F D

dcterms:creator: TELEDYNE FLIR
dcterms:description: FLIR is collected in day and night scenes with five categories: people, car, bike, dog, and other cars. The dataset includes FLIR-Aligned with 4,129 pairs for training and 1,013 for testing.
dcterms:title: FLIR
